Cherry Cola
Ed Hunting

Ed Hunting

Ed Hunting is the moniker of Canberra guitarist/singer/producer George Mitton. Playing in numerous punk bands including Other Liquid Fires, Ed Hunting is a further continuation of the blistering riffs and crunchy fuzz that defines George's singular sound.

Debut single Cherry Cola (#1 Punk Unearthed Charts) showcases Ed's two loves: DIY punk and bedroom electronica, melding the vintage and the modern for a propulsive groove that defies you not to dance. Entirely self produced in his bedroom, this production has set the stage for many new sounds to come.

edhuntingofficial@gmail.com

Ed Hunting
